reason.er.compositeObjects

Class KnowledgeBase<T,U>

  • java.lang.Object
    • reason.er.objects.Predicate<T,U>
      • reason.er.objects.Concept<T,U>
        • reason.er.compositeObjects.Expression<T,U>
          • reason.er.compositeObjects.KnowledgeBase<T,U>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - generic
    U - generic

    public class KnowledgeBase<T,U>
extends Expression<T,U>
    Container for an ABox and a TBox. Has methods that initialize or normalize both.
    Author:
    Aaron Eberhart
